verbs.description: [V: is] josh harris actually taking responsibility is josh harris actually taking responsibility josh harris was interviewed on npr recently i know this because my husband started yelling at me to come into the kitchen right freaking now and i was like wait you ca n't just order me to drop everything like that that not how it works and he was like trust me you 're going to want to hear this and there it was josh harris on npr discussing his 1997 book i kissed dating goodbye after reading his apology two months ago to several bloggers who have like me spent years blogging against the problems caused by the purity teachings promoted by harris and others i started listening with some optimism i was seriously seriously underwhelmed josh harris twitter world magazine joshua harris martin partner npr
